description: Big Pharma and US intelligence are among the culprits in conspiracy theories aired by Russian TV.
title: Coronavirus: Russian media hint at US conspiracy
title_page: Coronavirus: Russian media hint at US conspiracy - BBC News
maintext: The aim is variously said to be - in the case of "Big Pharma" - to profit from creating a vaccine against the coronavirus or, in the case of the US, to hit the Chinese economy in order to weaken a geopolitical competitor.
